properties.name: auth.db.health-table
properties.description: Database table used by health check.

properties.name: auth.db.user-table
properties.description: Database table used for user profile persistence.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.health-url
properties.description: Keycloak discovery endpoint used by health checks.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.token-url
properties.description: Keycloak token endpoint used for login.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.user-info-url
properties.description: Keycloak userinfo endpoint (unused for auth; retained for optional lookups).

properties.name: auth.rhbk.logout-url
properties.description: Keycloak logout endpoint used to revoke refresh tokens.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.users-url
properties.description: Keycloak admin users endpoint used for user provisioning.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.admin-token-url
properties.description: Keycloak token endpoint used for admin client credentials flow.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.client-id
properties.description: Client ID used for user login token requests.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.client-secret
properties.description: Client secret used for user login token requests.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.admin-client-id
properties.description: Admin client ID used for Keycloak user management.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.admin-client-secret
properties.description: Admin client secret used for Keycloak user management.

properties.name: auth.rhbk.timeout-ms
properties.description: HTTP timeout in milliseconds for Keycloak and dependency calls.
